insert into br_unmatch_order (merchant_id, merchant_order_no, pay_order_no, pay_type, amount, success_url, error_url, create_time) values (#{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{merchantOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{successUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update br_unmatch_order set merchant_id = #{merchantId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, merchant_order_no = #{merchantOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_order_no = #{payOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pay_type = #{payType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, success_url = #{successUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, error_url = #{errorUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, merchant_id, merchant_order_no, pay_order_no, pay_type, amount, success_url, error_url, create_time from br_unmatch_order where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
